name: Systems Thinking for UX UI Design
description:
Teaching systems thinking in the design classroom


Join us to learn how Christie Shin and C.J. Yeh, professors from FIT, State University of New York, teach systems thinking for UX/UI design. We’ll talk about the challenges of introducing systems thinking in design classes and dive into the UI design Certificate Program they’ve built.


The live stream video is available on Figma's Youtube channel.

https://youtu.be/hchsluJyw1A
